dataList.content: What did that fellow named Gubo want to do with the mirror, I wonder?
What exactly N Corp. wished to do... I do not know in detail. I did not bother to ask.
However...

dataList.title: N Corp.
dataList.content: How do you like it here, is it comfortable enough? Are you keeping yourself fed?

dataList.title: N Corp.
dataList.content: Like I said, ma'am, he is a reticent man.

dataList.title: N Corp.
dataList.content: Do you know of a way... to destroy all the worlds and the myriad possibilities they represent in the mirror and the glass window?

dataList.title: N Corp.
dataList.content: Of course you'd say no. I am telling you what to study.

dataList.title: N Corp.
dataList.content: Even if you say you don't want to, I have plenty of other ways.

dataList.title: N Corp.
dataList.content: But I thought I should have the courtesy to politely ask you first, for your friend's sake.

dataList.title: N Corp.
dataList.content: Ah, let's keep this as a little secret between the three of us, shall we?

dataList.title: N Corp.
dataList.content: ...Are the two still reluctant to rejoin the League? Aseah didn't seem to care either way, but these two are being tricky.

dataList.title: N Corp.
dataList.content: There is no need for concern. They'll make up their minds soon.

dataList.title: N Corp.
dataList.content: The new League formed here will be more powerful than ever. It's backed by none other than Miss Hermann.

dataList.title: N Corp.
dataList.content: What is the problem? Are you hesitant to take the offer without Dongrang and Dongbaek to accompany you?

dataList.title: N Corp.
dataList.content: ...Do you really not see that I can only set my mind at ease once you make your stance clear?
My mind has not changed from before.

dataList.title: Yeonsim
dataList.content: ...Destruction of the mirror worlds, huh. Gubo and Hermann seemed pretty serious about it.
You would be right. Once they have set their mind on it, it will undoubtedly be done.
And I... would end up aiding him in his purpose...
However...
I do not wish for you to perish as a result.
You must fly away and leave before Gubo destroys you as well.

dataList.title: Yeonsim
dataList.content: ...What about you?
Is it not abundantly clear? There is nothing I am capable of. Unlike you, I have no wings to fly with.
I have no complaints. If I mutely follow whatever they demand, they will at least let me be.
As I have said, all that I have left... is you outside the mirror.

dataList.title: Yeonsim
dataList.content: ...When you've suffered a loss, shouldn't you consider filling the void back up with new things?
What a peculiar question. This is all that is of my world, so how will I be able to fill it anew?
After that, you wouldn't show up before me for a time.
A question occurs to me at times.
I was the one who said this was all that I had, so why did you make such a devastated expression as though you lost everything?
It sounds like the Yi Sang in the mirror...
Wanted to keep him in this place. Telling him that it's not safe outside, so he should stay inside...
But, why would he do such a...

dataList.title: T Corp.
dataList.content: We're here to seize the technology created by the League of Nine, an unauthorized organization with illicit activities.

dataList.title: T Corp.
dataList.content: Present your clocks and identify yourselves in detail.
<Did the tech agency staff follow him all the way there?>
It's implausible for employees of T Corp's tech agency to chase him into N Corp.
Which suggests this is a foreign substance attempting to breach into the fathoms of ego.
